title: Build custom workflows automatically with GPT-4o, RAG, and web search
description:
## üöÄ What the ‚ÄúAgent Builder‚Äù template does

Need to **turn a one-line chat request into a fully-wired n8n workflow template‚Äîcomplete with AI agents, RAG, and web-search super-powers‚Äîwithout lifting a finger?**
That‚Äôs exactly what *Agent Builder* automates:

1. **Listens to any incoming chat message** (via the *Chat Trigger*).
2. **Spins up an AI architect** that analyses the request, searches the web, reads n8n docs from a Pinecone vector store, and designs the smallest possible set of nodes.
3. **Auto-generates a ready-to-import JSON template** and hands it back as a downloadable file‚Äîplus all the supporting assets (embeddings, vector store etc.) so the next prompt is even smarter.

Think of it as your personal ‚Äúworkflow chef‚Äù: you shout the order, it shops for ingredients, cooks, plates, and serves the meal. All you do is eat.

---

## ü§ó Who will love this?

* **No-code builders / power users** who don‚Äôt want to wrestle with AI node wiring.
* **Agencies & consultants** delivering lots of bespoke automations.
* **Internal platform teams** who need a ‚Äúworkflow self-service portal‚Äù for non-technical colleagues.

---

## üß© How it‚Äôs wired

| Sub-process                | What happens inside                                                                                                                                                                              | Key nodes                                                                              |
| -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Web Crawler** (optional) | Firecrawl scrapes docs.n8n.io (or any URL you drop in) and streams raw markdown back.                                                                                                            | `Set URL ‚Üí HTTP Request (Extract) ‚Üí Wait & Retry`                                      |
| **RAG Trainer**            | Splits the scraped docs, embeds them with OpenAI, and upserts vectors into Pinecone.                                                                                                             | `Recursive Text Splitter ‚Üí Embeddings OpenAI ‚Üí Train Pinecone`                         |
| **Agent Builder**          | The star of the show ‚Äì orchestrates GPT-4o (via OpenRouter), SerpAPI web-search, your Pinecone index and a Structured Output Parser to **produce ‚Üí validate ‚Üí prettify** the final n8n template. | `Chat Trigger ‚Üí AI Agent ‚Üí OpenAI (validator) ‚Üí Code (extract) ‚Üí Convert to JSON file` |

*Every arrow in the drawn workflow is pre-connected, so the generated template always passes n8n‚Äôs import check.*

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Getting set up (5 quick creds)

| Service                                             | Credential type                                            |
| --------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| **OpenAI / Azure OpenAI** ‚Äì embeddings & validation | *OpenAI API*                                               |
| **Pinecone** ‚Äì vector store                         | *Pinecone API*                                             |
| **OpenRouter** ‚Äì GPT-4o LLM                         | *OpenRouter API Key*                                       |
| **SerpAPI** ‚Äì web search                            | *SerpAPI Key*                                              |
| **Firecrawl** (only if you plan to crawl)           | Generic **Header Auth** ‚Üí `Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KEY` |

Each node already expects those creds; just create them once, select in the dropdown, hit **Activate**.

---

## üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è What a typical run looks like

1. **User says:** ‚ÄúBuild me a workflow that monitors our support inbox, summarises new tickets with GPT and posts to Slack.‚Äù
2. *Chat Trigger* captures the message.
3. **AI Agent**:

   * queries Pinecone for relevant n8n docs,
   * fires a SerpAPI search for ‚Äún8n gmail trigger example‚Äù,
   * sketches an architecture (Gmail Trigger ‚Üí GPT Model ‚Üí Slack).
4. The agent **returns JSON** ‚ûú OpenAI node double-checks field names, connections, type versions.
5. A tiny JS Code node slices the JSON out of the chat blob and **saves it as `template.json`** ready for download.
6. You download, import, and‚Ä¶ done.

---

## ‚úèÔ∏è Customising

* **Switch the LLM** ‚Äì plug in Claude 3, Gemini 1.5, or a local model; just swap the *OpenRouter Chat Model* node.
* **Point the RAG at your own docs** ‚Äì change the crawl URL or feed PDFs via the *Default Data Loader*.
* **Hard-code preferred nodes** ‚Äì edit the ‚ÄúUser node preferences‚Äù in the system message so the agent always chooses *Notion* for databases, etc.

---

## ü•° Take-away notes

* It's a **prototype** feel free to experiment with it to improve its capabilities.
* **Have fun building!**
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
